akn:content.akn:p: (a) Nonapplicability of statutory nonrenewal provisions The provisions of section 2802 of this title shall not apply to the nonrenewal of any franchise relationship—
(b) Definitions For purposes of this section—

akn:subsection.akn:heading: Nonrenewal upon meeting statutory notification requirements

akn:content.akn:p: (c) Nonrenewal upon meeting statutory notification requirements If the notification requirements of section 2804 of this title are met, any franchisor may fail to renew any franchise relationship—
